attributes.action: legislate to stop the mandatory payment for a Television licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there appear to be at least six, perhaps more, petitions against the BBC TV Licence - cannot the Government get the message that this is an unfair tax, especially for the elderly who have little income... and these petitions have hundreds of signatures already - let's put them all together!    ... It seems ridiculous to demand a yearly television licence payment which allegedly goes to the BBC, when one can watch many many other channels on freeview and Sky etc. All commercial television stations support themselves with advertising - I have no objection to the BBC also obtaining revenue from similar advertising. It's just another tax that we don't want or need.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
